name: Shark Blaster
description:
Shark Blaster was made for A Game By Its Cover 2017 jam (AGBIC).

How to play:

On keyboard
, (comma): Shoot
. (dot): Crouch down / Select button on menu
Arrow keys: Movement

On gamepad
X (button 2): Shoot
A (button 0): Crouch down / Select button on menu
Left trigger: Movement
